page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The area is serviced by K District of the Romford Division of the London Metropolitan Police. Officers are based at{Upminster Police Station.}The nearest courts are in Romford. Main problems are theft and vandalism. The Police Officer for our area is {P.C.Hill.}He has been in the police force for 27 years, 7 of which he has been on the home_beat. He walks his 8 hour shift, at day or at night. With him he carries a truncheon and a walkie talkie radio which is used for receiving and sending messages. His job is to look after all the people inside the boundaries of his beat, catch criminals, report incidents, control the traffic and lots of other commitments. Mostly he gets to know the people in his beat.
